sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.SSHPrivateKeyCredentialUtils</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>SSHPrivateKeyCredentialUtils</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var SSHPrivateKeyCredentialUtils = Class.create();

SSHPrivateKeyCredentialUtils.keyIsInCorrectFormat = function(key) {
	// Every valid ssh_private_key starts with '-----BEGIN' header
	if (!key.nil() && key.indexOf('-----BEGIN') != 0) 
		return false;
		
	return true;
};

SSHPrivateKeyCredentialUtils.encryptUsingKMFCryptoOperation = function(key) {
	var op = new sn_kmf_ns.KMFCryptoOperation('global.com_snc_core_automation_connection_credential_glideencrypter','SYMMETRIC_WRAPPING').withAlgorithm('AES').withInputFormat('KMFNone');
	return op.doOperation(String(key));
};

SSHPrivateKeyCredentialUtils.decrypt = function(key){
	var op = new sn_kmf_ns.KMFCryptoOperation('global.com_snc_core_automation_connection_credential_glideencrypter','SYMMETRIC_UNWRAPPING').withAlgorithm('AES').withInputFormat('KMF_GLIDE_ENCRYPTER_FORMATTED').withOutputFormat('KMFNone'); 
	return op.doOperation(String(key));
};

SSHPrivateKeyCredentialUtils.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
		
    },
    type: 'SSHPrivateKeyCredentialUtils',
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2021-10-19 22:06:56</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>81fd2be1c7133010bb93c49af4c26071</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>15</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>SSHPrivateKeyCredentialUtils</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Core Automation" source="com.snc.core.automation">6ca7f42c3cb1311068bcf327dfe37f6a</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_81fd2be1c7133010bb93c49af4c26071</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>now.midserver</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2023-10-06 06:10:09</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
